Name: Unity
Description: Unity is the ultimate game development platform. Use Unity to build high-quality 3D and 2D games, deploy them across mobile, desktop, VR/AR, consoles or the Web, and connect with loyal and enthusiastic players and customers.

Name: Unreal Engine
Description: Unreal Engine is the world's most open and advanced real-time 3D creation platform for photoreal visuals and immersive experiences.

Name: Godot
Description: Godot provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel. Free and open-source game engine under the MIT license.

Name: Game Maker Studio 2
Description: YoYo Games is the home of GameMaker. The easy to use powerful game engine that is the best for 2D games. Making games is for everyone. Uses GML Scripting, similar to JavaScript.

Name: Game Maker Studio
Description: Uses GML Scripting, similar to JavaScript

Name: Defold
Description: Defold is a free and open game engine used for development of console, desktop, mobile and web games.

Name: Phaser
Description: Desktop and Mobile HTML5 game framework. A fast, free and fun open source framework for Canvas and WebGL powered browser games.

Name: MonoGame
Description: Reimplementation of Microsoft XNA 4 Framework

Name: FNA
Description: Reimplementation of Microsoft XNA 4 Framework

Name: Heaps.io
Description: Cross platform graphics for high performance games.

Name: HaxeFlixel
Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, Web
Description: Open source cross-platform game framework

Name: Apple Dev Kits
Description: Learn about building games for macOS, iOS, watchOS, and tvOS with the latest Apple game technologies.

Name: Scratch
Description: Scratch is a free programming language and online community where you can create your own interactive stories, games, and animations. Education Tool designed to help teach kids programming my making games and animations.

Name: Buildbox
Description: Buildbox is a new video game maker that is extremely easy to use. Using this video game software, anyone can design amazing games for mobile, console, and PC.

Name: Cry Engine
Description: The complete solution for next generation game development by Crytek

Name: Lumberyard
Description: AAA game engine developed with an extensible C++ architecture. Deeply integrated with AWS and Twitch. Comes with full source. Games must use AWS for cloud services.

Name: id Tech
Description: id Software has 18 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.

Name: RPG Maker MZ
Description: Introducing RPG Maker MZ, the latest version from the RPG Maker series that allows anyone to make an RPG with ease! Thanks to new functions and improved operations, on top of accessing an enhanced creative environment and more powerful production elements, you can make a game that really answers what players want.

Name: Visual Novel Maker
Description: Check out all of the amazing features of Visual Novel Maker!

Name: Ren'py
Description: Visual Novel

Name: Spring
Description: RTS

Name: M.U.G.E.N
Description: Fighting (Latest version is 1.1 Beta)

Name: Visionaire Studio
Description: Point & Click

Name: Adventure Games Studio
Description: Point & Click

Name: Wintermute Engine
Description: Point & Click

Name: StoryStylus
Description: StoryStylus is software designed for storytellers to create, publish & play interactive story games for web, & mobile. Let�s create Story Worlds together! Point & Click.

Name: Quest
Description: Text Adventure or Interactive Fiction

Name: Inform 7
Description: Inform is a natural-language-based programming language for writers of interactive fiction. Text Adventure.

Name: Adrift
Description: Text Adventure

Name: TADS
Description: Text Adventure

Name: ADLENGINE
Description: A homage to Text Adventures and Multi-User Dungeons of old... The Adliberum Engine allows you to create text adventures, muds and text-powered roleplaying games. Complete with world editing commands; create worlds, games and puzzles that you can share or play with others all in real-time.

Name: Twine
Description: Interactive Fiction Game Tool

Name: Squiffy
Description: Interactive Fiction Game Tool

Name: ink
Description: Interactive Fiction Game Tool. Also comes as a Unity Plugin

Name: inklewriter
Description: Interactive Fiction Game Tool

Name: Adventure Cow Storylab
Description: Interactive Fiction Game Tool

Name: ChoiceScript
Description: ChoiceScript is a simple programming language for writing multiple-choice games (MCGs) like Choice of the Dragon.  Writing games with ChoiceScript is easy and fun, even for authors with no programm�

Name: PICO-8
Description: PICO-8 is a fantasy console for making, sharing and playing tiny games and other computer programs.

Name: TIC-80
Description: Fantasy computer for making, playing and sharing tiny games

Name: Pixel Vision 8
Description: Pixel Vision 8 is the first customizable 8-bit fantasy console. Don't just make games, design your fantasy console specs to match actual hardware, or create something new. It's perfect for game jams, prototyping ideas, and having fun!

Name: GB Studio
Description: A quick and easy to use drag and drop retro game creator for your favourite handheld video game system. Make Gamboy style games.

Name: PlayCanvas
Description: Collaboratively build stunning HTML5 visualizations and games

Name: Babylon.JS
Description: Babylon.js is one of the world's leading WebGL-based graphics engines. From a new visual scene inspector, best-in-class physically-based rendering, countless performance optimizations, and much more, Babylon.js brings powerful, beautiful, simple, and open 3D to everyone on the web. JavaScript framework for building 3D games with HTML5, WebGL, WebVR, and Web Audio.

Name: Solar2D
Description: Solar2D - Awesome open source 2D game engine. Formerly known as Corona

Name: Stride
Description: Formerly known as Xenko

Name: Unigine
Description: UNIGINE: real-time 3D engine. Photorealistic graphics, large virtual worlds, with C++ and C# API.

Name: UPBGE
Description: Game Engine that is integrated with Blender

Name: Armory
Description: Armory is an open-source engine for creating 3D-enabled software. Built using Blender.

Name: OpenFL
Description: Uses an API similar to Adobe Flash's Actionscript, but exports as HTML5

Name: Flixel
Description: Library for making games in Adobe Flash's Actionscript

Name: Starling
Description: Make games using Adobe Air and Adobe Flash Actionscript

Name: Construct 3
Description: Our world class game creator allows you to make your own game - no programming required. Try our game editor today and create a game in our game engine.

Name: Panda3D
Description: Panda3D is an open-source, cross-platform, completely free-to-use engine for realtime 3D games, visualizations, simulations, experiments you name it! Its rich feature set readily tailors to your specific workflow and development needs.
